scene_1.dialog: ...uuurgh..hmrg...
Finally, something! Steve, got get the car ready. Sergeant pickles, atattention!
...mhh...sir...

At ease, sergeant. I'll cut to the quick of it,your disposal went tits up,you took one for the company have been in St.Hugbears for a few weeks. At least you wore the suit, other wise they would have had to scrape you off the wall.
Whose wall?..weeks?..I can't..
Harumph, Jelly brain, figures...
The wha-
It's a form of short term amnesia,common in our profession.You'll remember it all once you get back on the horse.
Our profession?...
You're a police officer, at Pawston PD, read the badge! I inducted you to the force myself! You're in the bomb squad, and the city is up the creek with no paddle in sight.
The what creek?

Shit's creek, concentrate man!First it was a wave of theft, appliance stores, demolition sites, after that came the death threats to city workers, small fires and really nasty graffiti.Now,street div is finding bombs all across the city.The Mayor is shitting bricks and so is the commissioner.
Sounds bad, but why me? I'm sore all over and can remember hardly anything, where's the rest of the squad?

Well, about that.. Seemingly, that idiot Toby let them all on leave at the same time, and they all went on Admiral Walrus's Booze Cruise. They're useless. It's you, me and Steve from the motor pool. We're the bomb squad now.
But sir, Im sore all over..
I've thought about that, here, have this cinnamon roll
Its crunchy...
That's just the painkillers, an old trick, the riot squad special. Now get up, we've got no time to lose!
Look at you, walking it off
I guess..The van seems familiar..
Good, It's time to get down to business. This here is Steve. Say hi, Steve
Hi Steve.
Hrmph. Anyways, Van's ready, Just so, as there's already a situation on Sugarbear st.
Sir, what if I freeze or panic? I don't think Steve can cover for me if I do.
Hell no...sir.
Think fast, Sergeant!
Ow, what was that for?

A test, sergeant.Stay sharp, you're heading into action. That there is the Manual I told you to write, as a training aid. Seems adequate, though your prose needs work. It's still in prototype, but it seems now is the time to test it. Bully for you, Sergeant.

I can see your conflicted, Sergeant. I know it seems desperate, an amnesiac, a grease monkey and an retired old fart, trying to stop all this. But now, truly, is time to shit or get off the pot. Pawston is scared out of its wits, we must help. The game's afoot, gentlemen, you must be ready.
Yes sir!
Bully for you boys, now mount up and head to Sugarbear st. I'll stay with dispatch and feed you info as it comes in. All told, don't get captured.

scene_2.dialog: Look at you, all whole. Cakewalk,right?

scene_3.dialog: The perp, Biscuits, is being processed. I'll make him sweat in the box, for sure. But we've got no time to celebrate, a bomb has been found at the Stadium, you gotta head there now!
Yes sir. Steve, to Participants stadium!

scene_4.dialog: Bully for you, Sergeant. This Beauregard fellow makes me sick, all that money and no sense of proportion.The things these people get up to...
Sir, there's something about those bombs. I can't put my finger on it, but it reminds me of something,I don't know what.
Does it now? I've checked the street div's scene photos and I think you're onto something. The construction of these devices, there's some common threads here.
Might this be the work of an organisation?
It was theorised, and this seems to corroborate it. I'll have a word with the tech boys, see what they can dig up. Meanwhile you've got a new site to head to, Lovebird hill. Printout to follow.

scene_5.dialog: Now this creep's far worse than the last.The lip he gives,the smell, and the hair... So lemme get this straight,your generation spends their free time watching someone else playing video games? What's wrong with flyfishing? Good Dog...
It's an established form of entertainment sir, I'm not one to judge.

Be that as it may, Tech div cracked the shitheel's phone, turns out he's on a Harmony server called "Edgy Demo Boizz", we've cross-refenced the other creep's devices and they're members of the same group. Server host, "BabyVomitCannon" last used his phone at Friendship Tower's scenic restaurant, only a few minutes ago. You must get there immediately, the threat to the public is off the charts!

scene_6.dialog: Hackles! What are you doing here? You're supposed to be at Camp Manners! Are you off your meds?

Of course I am! Have you any idea how much of them I must eat every day? And the taste, cinnamon roll, I'm so sick of it! It's the fault of that disgusting cinnamon roll factory, everything in this town tastes like a baked good of somesort! TIME TO END IT, AND YOU!
But brother, you're not acting like yourself, can't you see? Your Evil Twin Syndrome is acting up again.

Of course I know, better than you! Which one of us was always dragged to the doctor, to listen to those sermons on morality and "how to just let him life his own life" I didn't get to choose any of this, and I just want it to stop.
I'll get you the help you need, I promise. But this time you went way too far, Im going to tell Mom and Dad.
